sentences.english: Her big eyes are her most striking feature.
sentences.chinese: 大眼睛是她容貌最显著的特点。

sentences.english: Look up her description in the missing persons' file.
sentences.chinese: 从丢失人员档案中查她的容貌特征。

sentences.english: Cause skin deep abscess formation, affecting facial appearance.
sentences.chinese: 导致皮肤生成深部脓疮，影响面部容貌。

sentences.english: In real life the Miluo River in what look like ?
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中的汨罗江是什么样子容貌？

sentences.english: The two sisters are as like as two peas.
Adjusting to a changing body is about more than just looks, though.
sentences.chinese: 然而，适应不断变化的身体不仅仅在容貌方面。

sentences.english: Suppose a very good actor feared that his looks could be injured.
sentences.chinese: 假定一个非常好的演员害怕他的容貌可能受伤。

sentences.english: The artist has reproduced your features very well in this portrait.
sentences.chinese: 这位艺术家在这幅画像中把你的容貌重现得维妙维肖。

sentences.english: Do not change the price according to the customer' looks.
sentences.chinese: 你不能以顾客的容貌来改价钱。

sentences.english: Fine clothes could not conceal the girl's homeliness.
sentences.chinese: 华丽的衣服并不能掩盖这个女孩的寻常容貌。

sentences.english: One likes to hear compliments on one's appearance.
sentences.chinese: 人人都爱听夸奖自己容貌的话。
这个疤痕有损于他的容貌。

sentences.english: The twins were almost identical in looks.
sentences.chinese: 这对双生子的容貌几乎完全相同。

sentences.english: Virtue may not always make a face handsome, but vice will certainly make it ugly.
sentences.chinese: 美德不一定能使容貌变美，邪念却必然令人变丑。

sentences.english: She is gorgeous, and amazingly talented and steals every scene she is in.
sentences.chinese: 她容貌美丽，天赋惊人，而且极为抢戏。

sentences.english: Welcomes the appearance of their own self-confidence handsome guy, and beautiful women are joining the game.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎对自己容貌有自信的帅哥，美女们的加入。

definition: five sense organs of TCM (nose, eyes, lips, tongue, ears 鼻目口舌耳)/facial features
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. countenance of a flower, face like the moon (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) beautiful
